nodes.text: Leave me alone! I don't want your stupid pile of junk!
What are you doing BANGING on my door?? Who do you think you are?!

choices.text: Woah buddy, calm down! I'm here to sell you something revolutionary!
Are you sure? It could absolutely change your life!

nodes.text: Well fine, since you're so insistent what even is it???

choices.text: Well, you see... *proceeds to give an ANNOYINGLY detailed explanation of the product*
Well I may not know just yet but I'm sure you will find the perfect place for it in your life!
